duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and file birth certificates for all births in the facility within 4 to 5 days.
Process and manage medical records, ensuring compliance with regulations and standards.
Communicate with external parties to obtain and confirm birth certificate information.
Order necessary forms to complete birth certificates from the Nevada State Division of Vital Statistics.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent.Required knowledge of medical record procedures and medical terminology. RHIT( ART) is helpful.
